* include/rw/_config-msvc.h: ... to here. Disable warning C4661.
and 'extern' are incompatible on an explicit instantiation".

author: svkrish

author: jm
msg: bug 5726: remove ROUND_THE_WORLD, ROUND_THE_WORLD_LOCAL, FAKE_HELO_MAIL_COM, FAKE_HELO_EXCITE, FAKE_HELO_LYCOS, FAKE_HELO_MSN, FAKE_HELO_EMAIL_COM, FAKE_HELO_YAHOO_CA.  These rules performed PTR network lookups, but had results that were too bad to be worth the performance hit
